snippet: After a meeting with Russia’s president at the Group of 20 summit meeting failed, President Obama said he had told Secretary of State John Kerry to continue negotiating....
abstract: Talks between Pres Obama and Russian Pres Vladimir Putin break down in Laos, foiling attempt to broker cease-fire in Syrian civil war; Obama insists he will continue to pursue solution in Syria and has instructed Sec of State John Kerry to continue negotiating with Russia.

byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: After a meeting with Russia’s president at the Group of 20 summit meeting failed, President Obama said he had told Secretary of State John Kerry to continue negotiating.

headline.main: ‘Gaps of Trust’ With Russia Bar a Syrian Truce, Obama Says
headline.print_headline: ‘Gaps of Trust’ With Russia Bar New Effort to Broker Syrian Cease-Fire, Obama Says
